sections.heading: Overview
content:
As founder and president of Akerland and Associates , Donald E.
Akerland assists other drug recognition experts and instructors with training
in drug identification and influence recognition and provides training in
substance abuse awareness to private companies. A former narcotics officer,
detective, and field training officer, he is currently a police officer in
Stockton, Calif.

Akerland is certified as a drug recognition expert by the U.S. Department of
Transportation, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, and the
International Association of Chiefs of Police.
